thread.title: The 24 Best Sneakers Releasing This Weekend and Where to Buy Them
thread.title_full: The 24 Best Sneakers Releasing This Weekend and Where to Buy Them

author: Graeme Campbell
title: The 24 Best Sneakers Releasing This Weekend and Where to Buy Them
text:
Here’s your weekend release checklist including limited drops from Nike, adidas Originals, FENTY PUMA, New Balance, Patta x Diadora, and more. We’re back to recap the most noteworthy sneaker releases of the weekend ahead, ensuring that you stay plugged into the source and are able to cop with the swiftness.
As always, a ton of great kicks from a wide range of brands are releasing, so we put them all together here for convenience. Peep the selection below.
Release Date: Saturday, March 11
From: Nike
